forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 48. East northeast wind 5 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. North wind 2 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Downtown San Francisco, a serene clarity graces the cityscape, indicating a tranquil evening ahead. The forecast promises a gentle transition into Friday, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable low in the 40s, complemented by the soft caress of an easterly breeze. No fog disturbs the crystalline visibility; the bay remains unfettered by the usual marine layer, allowing for a breathtaking view towards the Golden Gate, accentuated by the twinkling lights of the city.

Tomorrow unfolds under a sunlit sky, where temperatures will rise to the low 60s, softening as the afternoon progresses. The breezes may dance up to a lively 16 mph, suggesting a light jacket would be wise—perfect for a leisurely stroll or perhaps a sit at a cozy café, watching the world go by. With the clear skies inviting, one might explore the vibrant streets of the Mission District or venture down to Ferry Building Marketplace, indulging in the delights of local artisans. In this embrace of pleasant weather, San Francisco beckons quietly, promising a day full of understated joys.
